headline: Nucor Announces Promotion of Thomas J. Batterbee to Executive Vice President and Appointment of Elizabeth Bledsoe as President of Human Resources and Talent
summary: Nucor Corporation (NYSE: NUE) announced today the promotion of Thomas J. Batterbee to the position of Executive Vice President of Human Resources and Talent and the appointment of Elizabeth Bledsoe to the newly created position of President of Human Resources and Talent, both effective May 11, 2025. In these roles, Mr. Batterbee and Ms. Bledsoe will focus on Nucor's enterprise talent development and human resources strategy.

In these roles, Mr. Batterbee and Ms. Bledsoe will focus on Nucor's enterprise talent development and human resources strategy.

headline: Nucor to Report Q1 Earnings: What's in the Offing for the Stock?
summary: Lower average selling prices are likely to have hurt NUE's sales and margins in the first quarter.
